description:
The Hike Medium Crew Tree Line socks are durable, breathable, and odor-resistant socks for any trip out on the trails. The fully cushioned, quick-drying design has key support zones in the Achilles and instep, with double-up cushioning for increased comfort. Reinforcements in the toe and heel increase durability, and the seamless toe reduces bulk and prevents blisters.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Hike Crew Socks - Medium Cushion - Tree Line - Mens
